official_title: To establish the United States Commission on an Open Society with Security.
short_title: United States Commission on an Open Society with Security Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: United States Commission on an Open Society with Security Act - Establishes the United States Commission on an Open Society with Security to study how the Government may provide for both security in and public access to Federal buildings and spaces.

titles.title: United States Commission on an Open Society with Security Act
To establish the United States Commission on an Open Society with Security.
